PreviewTexts.Params:
[VersionInfo]
    Version = 1.0

[SystemTop_MachineManagerService_TcpSocket]
   IsServer = false

[SystemTop_MachineManagerService_UdpSocket]
   IsUdp = true
   IsServer = false

[M2kFwk]
   ; LogTypes = EWID

[Main]
   UseProcessLogger = true
   UseOldProcessLogger = false
 
   HP_WaitForMcesOnInit = false
   HP_RunOnlyOutOfServiceMode = true
   HP_HasChkDoorLocked = false

[Workstation 1]
   Type = TCADSDO
   MinGuiSampleTimeInMs = 250
   HighActive = 0
   TcAdsDoAddress = IO_Task_lms.Outputs.PU300_I_SignalRed_DO
   TcAdsDoAdsPort = 301
PreviewTexts.Default:
[VersionInfo]
   Version = 1.0

[SystemTop_MachineManagerService_TcpSocket]
   RetryInterval = 10
   Retries = 1
   Port = 0
   RemoteAddress = 0.0.0.0
 
[SystemTop_MachineManagerService_UdpSocket]
   RetryInterval = 10
   Retries = 5
   Port = 1981 ;0
   RemoteAddress = 0.0.0.0

[Main]
   MachineTimeout = 150.0
   MP_TimeStopMachine = 60
   MP_WaitTimeForMcesOnInit = 20.0
   RunTimeInHour = 0
PreviewTexts.M2kSys:
[MachineManagerService]
   Debug = false
   IsMachineClient = true
   ClientType = 1
   ClientId = 1

   TcpPort = 10010
   TcpPortSec = 5000

   UdpPort = 1981

   RemoteAddress = 192.168.201.1

   TargetDir = \Application Data\
